text: Nikki Fancy (born April 11, 1991) is a digital media producer. She grew up in Lexington, Massachusetts. Fancy began her career at Maker Studios where she developed and managed digital talent. She produced and helped launch the popular online series, Epic Rap Battles of History. At age 23, Fancy was included in Forbes' 2015 list of "30 Under 30", as the Senior Director of Programming Strategy at Maker Studios. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Maker Studios people Category:American web producers
title: Nikki Fancy
